description:
Parameters for setting a specific property value at a path.

Used by `setup_set_value` to modify a single property within a configuration object.

# Fields * `path` - Base configuration path + property_name as leaf * `value` - New value for the property

# Example ```json { "path": "/audio/output/speaker/1/user/gain", "value": -3.0 } ```

value.description: Value to set for the property

title: JapiSetValueParams
